query.stmt: insert into bi_manu(id,company,job_num,content,state,create_user,create_time,author_one, author_two,author_three,dept_id) select bi_manu_seq.nextval,[company],[var(RU.CUR_USER.id)],[content],0,[var(RU.CUR_USER.id)], sysdate,[author_one],[author_two],[author_three],dept_id from sys_p_user where id=[var(RU.CUR_USER.id)]
